attributes.review: Thought this would be just the absolute BEST designed app in the iTunes Store... come to find out it is unBELIEVABLY the worst app in all existence. The design, details, operation... can’t even use it. It’s a tragedy really. A shame that it can’t even function as a basic app. Disgraceful.
attributes.title: Unbelievable App!

attributes.review:
Reasons I don’t recommend this app!

1. Takes weeks to download
2. The app overall is just disgusting 🤢
3. Once you download the app and you click “sign in” or something it takes a few minutes to actually open the process
4. I had to restart my phone 2 times for the application to open
5. Once I had opened the sign in page after I registered I couldn’t enter into the app 

Thank you for reading if you did 🙏🏽
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever seen!!

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone got a virus and was hacked. They got all my card information and spent a bunch of my savings. Now I’m homeless with no where to live. The hackers also showed up to my house and robbed me and burned my house down so this is what the trump app is.
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: all around just a very bad app. it made my phone glitch and restart and nothing ever loaded. not only this, but it kept making me reset my account with error codes. very annoying & not helpful at all. I do not recommend.
attributes.title: horrid

attributes.review: i thought this app would convince me to like trump like all of his cult followers but once i opened the app it basically slapped me in the face and dragged me across my kitchen floor with how bad it is. i understand now why people blame illnesses on phones because i had to go to the optometrist because i lost all my sight because of how bad this app is. this app made me hate trump more than i already did which i didn’t think was possible. i wish i could give negative stars.
attributes.title: horrible app (i’m blind now)

attributes.review:
wanted to download to support da 🟠👄🟠cheeto🟠👄🟠but the minute I opened it I saw a racist instead🤢turns out the app tracks you too🙄💅🏼I was walking down the street and da cops showed up and started shooting up the place smh (acab😏) anyways 🤪 download if you want to die 😋✊🏼✨💅🏼🧚🏼‍♀️
p.s. if you remove tik tok I’ll burn down america🙈
attributes.title: ew✨🧚🏼‍♀️😌🤪💅🏼

attributes.review: I have supported Trump since the 2016 election and I will continue to support the amazing man! But I am VERY disappointed by this app. They are spamming my phone with emails and pointless notifications. This app also gave my phone a virus that costs $2,000 to repair. What kind of libtard made this TERRIBLE APP!!! Anyways TRUMP 2020!!!!
attributes.title: Worst App I Ever Got!!

attributes.review: I cannot believe how terrible this app is. I just wanted to support the myth, the man, the legend, President 🍊. When I opened the app, there was terrifying music playing that made my house erupt with tarantulas. Soon after, my house shook so hard it fell to the ground. It is unfathomable how upsetting this app is. My vote now goes to Biden.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.review: right as i downloaded this app my phone started overheating! i closed the app and it was still hot it felt so hot it felt COLD! i powered my phone on and off again but it didn't work! keep in mind i had my phone on my trump2020 bedsheets and the phone got so hot it hurt to hold! it burnt a hole in my bedsheets DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: HELP!

attributes.review: This app is almost as slow as bunker boy himself... took almost 20 minutes for the app to work on my brand new iPhone. I would give this 0 stars if I could. Can’t believe this is even on the App Store. Fox News and CNN are probably faster than this.
attributes.title: 🤮 DO NOT DOWNLOAD
